t: Springs Window Fashions Completes New Capital Infusion to Support Growth
s: Springs Window Fashions, based in Middleton, Wisconsin, is a leading manufacturer of custom window treatments. Its Bali®, Graber®, Horizons®, SWFcontract™, Mecho™, Mariak™, and SunSetter™ brands are sold through retailers and distributors within North America.
